import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save organization attachments"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/{OrganizationId}/attachments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Replaces the attachment list for an organization with the provided file metadata. Use this endpoint to add or remove organization attachments in bulk by supplying the full desired FileData list.

**Prerequisites**
1. **OrganizationId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organizations-by-query-get) and extract `Items[].OrganizationId`.
2. **FileData** - Build using file metadata from your upload workflow or existing attachment details.

**Workflow Example**
1. Fetch current attachments with [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/\{OrganizationId\}/attachments](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-attachments).
2. Build the new FileData array, adding/removing items as needed.
3. Call [POST /api/v1.0/organizations/\{OrganizationId\}/attachments](/docs/api/organizations/save-organization-attachments) with FileData.

**Minimal Required Fields**: FileData array in the request body.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated; any files not included in FileData are removed.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"OrganizationId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for updating file associations on an entity (location floorplans, images, etc.)","properties":{"FileData":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"File metadata associated with an entity (location, room, etc.). Used for floorplans, images, and other file attachments.","properties":{"FileId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the file"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description or caption for the file"}},"required":["FileId"],"title":"EntityFileDetail"},"description":"Array of file details to associate with the entity. Existing files not in this list will be removed."}},"required":["FileData"],"title":"UpdateEntityFileDetailsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Attachments saved.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Generic response for actions that do not return a specific entity.
